channel.title: Lift As You Rise
channel.managingEditor: liftasyourise@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Lift As You Rise | Solid Gold Studios)
channel.copyright: © Red Bull Music and Tall Racks Records - all rights reserved

description.p: Red Bull Music and Tall Racks Records present 'Lift As You Rise', a collaborative project focusing on uplifting artists across South Africa.
This project comprises of Nasty C, Tellaman, Gemini Major, Rowlene, Lastee, and Zino D who recorded music and left spaces for other musicians to add their 16 bars.
In this series we reveal why this project is close to them, who uplifted them on their come up, why it's important to help one another out in the industry and other interesting topics.
Recorded at SolidGoldStudios.co.za and Edited by Willem Nel

item.itunes:author: Red Bull Music and Tall Racks Records | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Lift As You Rise - Artists' Conversation | Nasty C, Gemini, Rowlene, Tellaman, Lastee, Zeno D, Mahadi Lehlongoane
item.itunes:title: Lift As You Rise - Artists' Conversation | Nasty C, Gemini, Rowlene, Tellaman, Lastee, Zeno D, Mahadi Lehlongoane
item.itunes:subtitle: Hear what the 'Lift As You Rise' artists have to say about this initiative.
item.description:
#LiftAsYouRise is conceptually ahead of its time. You seldom find renowned artists taking a week out of their schedules to create music with spaces for other aspiring artists to add their verse. This podcast is a bridge in to the minds of the artists who are behind this initiative as they talk about what inspired them to do something this game-changing.


What is Lift As You Rise? click here

Lift As You Rise Music click here


Join the conversation on Twitter @TallRacksRec

See more on Instagram @TallRacksRec

Follow us on Facebook /tallracksrecords


This podcast was recorded at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

Edited by Willem Nel
